tool.name: Generate muon structures (pm-muairss)
tool.command: pip show pymuon-suite || ( git clone https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite /tmp/pymuon-suite && pip install /tmp/pymuon-suite && rm -rf /tmp/pymuon-suite) && cp $structure input.cell && cp $params params.yaml && pm-muairss -t w input.cell params.yaml && out_folder="`python ${__tool_directory__}/get_out_folder.py`" && zip -r out_zip.zip \$out_folder params.yaml input.cell && find \$out_folder > tree.txt
tool.help:
usage: pm-muairss [-h] [-t {r,w}] structures parameter_file
Given an input structure, generates a set of structures with a muon added in a random location.

citations.citation: @misc{github, author = {Muon Spectroscopy Computational Project}, year = {2021}, title = {pymuon-suite}, publisher = {GitHub}, journal = {GitHub repository}, url = {https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite/}, }
